page.title: 12FIRE AT MILL FARM, WHALEY.
page.content: On February 14th. 1985 my home, Mill Farm, Whaley, was burnt to a cinder.It was the worst fire that I had ever seen. The Firemen came with four engines and two of them were frozen up. My family and I were out when the fire began. The firemen 'phoned Mum at a friend's house and told her about it. They thought it must be a joke at first, that is until they got home. When we saw the damage my mum cried and my dad was stunned. Now Mill Farm is being rebuilt as another little cottage.
